start of the in use study   an unknown impurity has been seen which was larger dan 0.2%. The retention time of placebo peak and impurity peak are very close together. At t=24 of stability study the peaks completely overlapped and therefore the impurity peak was not noticed. At t=12 of the stability study
the peak was absent. therefore the impurity peak was formed after t=12. To improve the detection of this impurity, there are actions suggested for method improvement. This will be disscussed with the client.
